name: Dribbble
purpose: Design inspiration platform and community for discovering high-quality UI/UX designs, design systems, and visual work
description: Dribbble is a community platform where designers showcase their work, providing a rich source of design inspiration for UI/UX, branding, illustration, and more. The platform is particularly valuable for AI-assisted design workflows as a source of high-quality design system screenshots that can be analyzed and extracted by AI models like GPT-5. Users search for 'design system' keywords to find flat, clear UI component layouts that serve as inspiration sources for the 3-prompt design system generation methodology. Dribbble's focus on apps and user interfaces makes it ideal for finding comprehensive design system examples.
cost_structure: Free browsing, Pro membership for advanced features ($12-15/month)

actual_remote_helpers_usage.primary_use: Design System Inspiration Source for AI Analysis
use_cases: screenshot design systems for AI extraction
workflows: AI-Assisted Design System Generation (Prompt 1 input source)

steps: Filter for 'flat' design system screenshots (not posters)
Select clear UI component layouts without extraneous elements
Ensure components are visible at good scale
Paste into Cursor for GPT-5 analysis
selection_criteria: No dashed borders or extra decorative elements

strengths: Searchable by keywords (design system, UI, etc.)
Wide variety of styles and approaches
limitations: Not all designs are design systems (requires filtering)
search_tips: Add color keywords (e.g., 'design system blue') for specific palettes
Filter by popularity for high-quality examples
Check that components are clearly visible
typical_output: Screenshot (PNG/JPG) of design system for AI analysis
